programme.desc: Magnodozer - Dozer is put to the test in order to clear a path through Cave In Canyon when he gets hit by a magnetic surprise.

programme.title: Dinotrux Supercharged S3 Ep64
programme.desc: Liftasaurs - While the trux are gathering supplies on the outskirts of the crater an ageold dispute between feuding herd breaks out.

programme.title: Turbo F.a.s.t. S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Cruise Control , R,C Turbo - The snails are invited to perform on a cruise ship and while onboard Turbo encounters a group of rodent pirates who challenge him to a raceloser has to walk the plank/When Turbo is knocked out before a big charity race, Skidmark creates a shell that allows the crew to race the unconscious Turbo with a remote control.

programme.title: Turbo F.a.s.t. S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Curse Of The Cicadas , Beat A Fajita - The snails accidentally wake a group of cicadas from their hibernation and after the bugs begin eating the town's food supply the snails go to extreme measures to rid the city of the /A celebrity chef steals Tito's taco recipe and challenges the FAST crew to a relay race against his own group of copycat racing snails.

programme.title: Where's Wally? S2 Ep25
programme.desc: Norway Out - Odlulu is on the hunt for the Wind Key so she can use it as the world's greatest hair dryer. But the Wind Key is too powerful for Odlulu to handle, so Wally, Wenda and Whitebeard head to Norway to locate the key before Odlulu can find it. Luckily, Whitebeard is a master sailor and can guide the Wanderers through the fjords. Unfortunately, Whitebeard also gets majorly seasick.

programme.title: Where's Wally? S2 Ep26

When her mischievous shadows run off with the key, the Wanderers learn the only way to reattach the shadows is to touch them with the key. So, with the promise of a puppet show, they lure the shadows to the puppet theater, where they launch an epic game of tag to recapture the shadows before sunset

programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Playground / The Crew Fixes A Roof - After Speed Meister builds an unsafe playground, the Rubble & Crew get creative and build a whole new one with old materials. programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Car Wash / The Crew Plans Grandpa Day - Mayor Greatway needs her muddy motorcycle cleaned fast! programme.desc: Frog Song - It's fun on the counting train until Naughty Monkey starts to drive! Ethel makes a shape, Frog drops beats with a ribbit song, and Enid turns into anime to chase after a mouse.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep4
programme.desc: What's Hot? - Billy and the Sillies introduce a visit to chicken A&E, the Squirrels build a bug house, Norrie has her chance to shine, and the Penguins give facts about what's hot and what's not.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep40
programme.desc: Pirate Peril, Jamaica - Xuli dives into action when Glitch's pirate game puts Lars in danger. Yo-ho Go Jetters go!

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep27
programme.desc: Pirates - It's an adventure on the high seas as Bluey, Bingo and Missy play Pirates on the hammock swing, but they'll need to find their courage to withstand storms and whale attacks.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep30
programme.desc: Barky Boats - Bluey and Mackenzie are excited to spend time with their two buddies Mia and Captain; when the older kids run off to play together without them, Calypso explains that growing up can be hard.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Andy and the Puma Cubs - Andy, Jen & Scout head to Patagonia, in South America on a baby animal mission in search of mother puma and her four cubs.

programme.title: Dog Squad S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Mission: Horse Riding - Disability assistance dog Tinks visits Clip-Clop Stables with Charli, where they meet a very tall horse called Mist who is taking Charli for her first ever horse-riding lesson.

programme.title: Steve and Aneeshwar Go Wild S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Meerkat and Giant Millipede - Steve and Aneeshwar meet a group of busy meerkats, who show them their digging skills, then go to see some giant millipedes to find out the surprising skill they have in common.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S7 Ep1
programme.desc: Captain Captain's Back - In this episode Captain Captain returns to her beloved Scarlet Squid (much to the surprise of Gem) and has brought along two brand new pirates, Sandy and Seaweed, to help win those jewels back.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep43
programme.desc: The Looking After Badge - Outside the clubhouse a large crowd has gathered around a hot air balloon with whisperings that someone is going on an adventure!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep42
programme.desc: The Organising Badge - Roly is trying to force a very large plastic ball into the bin, but it flies out and crashes into a tower that Betty has built.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep41
programme.desc: The Grandparents Badge - Duggee and the squirrels are tidying up - its Bring your Grandparents to Squirrel Club Day. Duggee has his Grandparents badge so he knows what they will like, a nice cup of tea.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep10
programme.desc: Tulip Fields, Netherlands - Is Glitch stealing tulips from the Netherlands? That's what the Go Jetters think!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep9
programme.desc: Go Jetter Heroes: Amelia Earhart - Inspired by her hero Amelia Earhart, Xuli attempts a solo flight across the Atlantic.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S24 Ep12
programme.desc: Thomas and the Inventor's Workshop - Thomas is asked to help find the inventor, Ruth, a new home and workshop on Sodor.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep18
programme.desc: Balloon Barnacles - Sarah's hat goes on an adventure without her, on top of a balloon.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep19
programme.desc: Basking Shark - Sarah is keen to adopt a sea creature, but doesn't get her first choice...

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep43
programme.desc: Den - Little Woo and Seamus call Stanley to help them build a den so they can watch the bugs in the forest without disturbing them. Stanley builds a giant, camouflaged den on legs.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep42
programme.desc: Shipwreck - Benjamin and Hettie find an old treasure map that leads to Blue Whiskers' Pirate Shipwreck! They ask Stanley to help them find it and maybe bring it back to show the townsfolk.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Tasty Trip - After seeing an advertisement for the World Food Festival, Monty wonders if there are ways to explore the world other than travelling.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S1 Ep5
programme.desc: It's time to find a butterfly - JoJo searches for a butterfly to complete her nature tick-book. She learns that all butterflies start life as furry little caterpillars.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep16
programme.desc: Phones - Bluey and Bingo want to play restaurants with Grandad, but it's a little different than he's used to... he's going to need an app to order the food!

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep17
programme.desc: Pavlova - Mum won't let Bingo have Pavlova, so the kids find a way by playing a cheeky game of Caf in the kitchen. But Dad the chef sets up a competing shop that only serves edamame beans.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep18
programme.desc: Rain - When a heavy summer rain thunders over the Heeler home, Bluey is determined to dam the water in the front yard, while Mum tries to stop her constantly tracking mud into the house.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep46
programme.desc: The Playing Badge - The squirrels are playing in the clubhouse. Naughty Monkey arrives and causes chaos! He later returns to his home to relax when there is a knock at his door. It's his cousins, come to visit.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep45
programme.desc: The Singing Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels are out on a walk in the countryside. Its been a long walk and the squirrels are starting to get tired, but it's a long way back. Don't worry, Duggee has his singing badge.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Campfire Choir - Today at Squirrel Club, there are all sorts of comparisons to learn - from small to smallest, hungry to hungriest, and Duggee to Duggiest!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep40
programme.desc: Pirate Peril, Jamaica - Xuli dives into action when Glitch's pirate game puts Lars in danger. Yo-ho Go Jetters go!

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Celery - Live from the Roots & Fruits theatre, it's Celery performing We're Here to Grow - if he manages to squeeze himself out of the dressing room on time.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Plum - Live from the Roots & Fruits theatre, it's Plum performing the Sugar Plum Fairy Bounce and attempting to do not one, not two, but three pirouettes in midair!

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep43
programme.desc: Pea Repeats - Supertato is due to receive the Best Hero Award, but Evil Pea decides she should get it. Carrot tells her she needs to defeat herself to win the award.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep44
programme.desc: Da Veggie Code - Supertato's Tato belt gets locked inside a glass case for an exhibition, but Tomato can't remember the code to get it out again, and Supertato needs it back to defeat Evil Pea.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep89
programme.desc: Swap Places - The Teletubbies swap places in the Tubby Car and drive to the Hidey Hup. They swap places again on the Tubby Uppy Downy before going up and down.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S5 Ep9
programme.desc: Plate - Dee encourages a friend to say 'plate' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. Today's episode is all about plates!

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Jurassic Pop - A new museum opens, so Zip and his friends try to find a fossil for the display.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S2 Ep23
programme.desc: Messy's Pixel Power - How do pictures get onto a screen, and how does a cartoon get into your TV? When you need to know, go to OKIDO!

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep41
programme.desc: Stickbird - In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep40
programme.desc: Relax - In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep14
programme.desc: The Shopping Badge - Duggee loves to shop local, so the Big Shop is a Big Deal for him. He's over-excited and wants two of everything. The Squirrels have to remind him 'we only popped in for milk!'

programme.title: Core Kyoto

programme.title: ASTAF Sepaktakraw AsianCup Kuala Lumpur 2025 - Final (Thailand vs Malaysia)
programme.desc: Team Regu - The ASTAF Sepaktakraw Asian Cup 2025 is set to take place from May 10 to May 18, 2025, at the prestigious Titiwangsa Indoor Stadium in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. This exciting tournament will showcase the best Sepaktakraw talent from across Asia, bringing together top teams and athletes to compete in a vibrant and dynamic environment.

programme.title: LIGUE 1 TOP 10 SAVES
programme.desc: LIGUE 1 TOP 10 SAVES - Shot stoppers at their fingertip-saving best. 10 of the best split-second reactions to certain goals from the 22/23 Ligue 1 season.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC313PereiravsAnkalaev
programme.desc: After a historic 2024 that saw him defend his UFC light heavyweight title three times with three knockouts, Brazilian superstar Alex Pereira begins the new year in Las Vegas with a main event clash against number one contender Magomed Ankalaev. Plus former interim lightweight champion Justin Gaithje battles Rafael Fiziev for the second time, and much much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep10
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep1
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback EpUFC305DuPlessisvsAdesanya
programme.desc: UFC 305 featured the battle for the middleweight title as reigning champion Dricus "Stillknocks" Du Plessis defended his belt against former champion Israel "The Last Stylebender" Adesanya. See their fight like never before with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC315MuhammadvsDellaMaddalena
programme.desc: When the Octagon returns to Montreal for the first time since 2015, fans are treated to a stacked card headlined by a championship doubleheader. In the main event, Belal Muhammad defends his welterweight crown for the first time against Australian powerhouse Jack Della Maddalena, and Manon Fiorot battles to be the first female French champion against Flyweight phenom Valentina Shevchenko. Plus, the return of Jose Aldo and much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Knockouts Ep1103InternationalFighters
programme.desc: UFC Ultimate Knockouts features explosive KOs from international fighters, showcasing stars from Russia, England, and South Africa like Dricus du Plessis, Paddy Pimblett, Ilia Topuria, and more.

programme.title: LIGUE 1 TOP 10 ACROBATICS GOALS
programme.desc: LIGUE 1 TOP 10 ACROBATICS GOALS - Golazo! 10 of the best volleys & scissor kicks that found the net from the Ligue 1 22/23 season.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Garcia vs. Onama
programme.desc: Prelims - The month of November opens with a return to the UFC APEX and a UFC Fight Night event headlined by streaking featherweights Steve Garcia and David Onama. Fighting out of Albuquerque, New Mexico, Garcia touches down for his first main event assignment riding a six-fight winning streak with five finishes. Not to be outdone, the 31-year-old Onama enters having won four straight, including victories over ascending prospect Gabriel Sangtos and rankings mainstay Giga Chikadze.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Garcia vs. Onama
programme.desc: Main Event - The month of November opens with a return to the UFC APEX and a UFC Fight Night event headlined by streaking featherweights Steve Garcia and David Onama. Fighting out of Albuquerque, New Mexico, Garcia touches down for his first main event assignment riding a six-fight winning streak with five finishes. Not to be outdone, the 31-year-old Onama enters having won four straight, including victories over ascending prospect Gabriel Sangtos and rankings mainstay Giga Chikadze.

programme.title: LIGUE 1 TOP 10 ACROBATICS GOALS

programme.title: UFC 321: Aspinall vs. Gane
programme.desc: Prelims - The UFC heavyweight world championship will be on the line on October 25 at Etihad Arena in Abu Dhabi when Tom Aspinall defends his undisputed crown for the first time against Ciryl Gane in the main event of UFC 321. Englands Aspinall has ended his last three wins by knockout, including an interim title-winning effort over Sergei Pavlovich and a successful defense against Curtis Blaydes. This fall, he will face another stern test in French star Gane, a former interim champ looking to add undisputed goal to his trophy case after back-to-back wins over Serghei Spivac and Alexander Volkov

programme.title: UFC 321: Aspinall vs. Gane

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Garcia vs. Onama
programme.desc: Prelims - The month of November opens with a return to the UFC APEX and a UFC Fight Night event headlined by streaking featherweights Steve Garcia and David Onama. Fighting out of Albuquerque, New Mexico, Garcia touches down for his first main event assignment riding a six-fight winning streak with five finishes. Not to be outdone, the 31-year-old Onama enters having won four straight, including victories over ascending prospect Gabriel Sangtos and rankings mainstay Giga Chikadze.

programme.title: UFC 321: Aspinall vs. Gane
programme.desc: Prelims - The UFC heavyweight world championship will be on the line on October 25 at Etihad Arena in Abu Dhabi when Tom Aspinall defends his undisputed crown for the first time against Ciryl Gane in the main event of UFC 321. Englands Aspinall has ended his last three wins by knockout, including an interim title-winning effort over Sergei Pavlovich and a successful defense against Curtis Blaydes. This fall, he will face another stern test in French star Gane, a former interim champ looking to add undisputed goal to his trophy case after back-to-back wins over Serghei Spivac and Alexander Volkov
